alert.note: Alert for Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:54PM CST until February 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River At Columbia affecting Maury County. For the Duck River...including Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Duck River At Columbia. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Flood waters will reach Riverside Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 28.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 36.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 300 PM CST.
